org.osjava.sj.jndi
Class DelegatingContext

java.lang.Object
  org.osjava.sj.jndi.DelegatingContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
Context
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleContext
public abstract class DelegatingContext
extends Object
implements Context

Standard delegating pattern for JNDI Contexts. Sub-classes of this may filter calls to the JNDI code.
